entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 12:13 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
